original_text: “They are to take all the articles used for ministering in the sanctuary, wrap them in a blue cloth, cover that with the durable leather and put them on a carrying frame.
korean_text: 성소에서 봉사하는 데에 쓰는 모든 기구를 취하여 청색 보자기에 싸서 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮어 메는 틀 위에 두고

sentences.original_text: They are to take all the articles
used for ministering in the sanctuary
wrap them in a blue cloth
cover that with the durable leather
put them on a carrying frame
